docs.lead_paragraph: Your child throws a tantrum and smashes something? Take out "naughty child insurance". Similarly, buy cover against your bride becoming pregnant before the honeymoon, your team being knocked out of the soccer World Cup, burning your tongue eating hotpot or if smog ruins your holiday.

headline.main: Tantrums, Concubines, Hotpot Burns and Smog: China Insurers Have It Covered
headline.print_headline: Tantrums, Concubines, Hotpot Burns and Smog: China Insurers Have It Covered

docs.snippet: Your child throws a tantrum and smashes something? Take out "naughty child insurance". Similarly, buy cover against your bride becoming pregnant before the honeymoon, your team being knocked out of the soccer World Cup, burning your tongue eating...

docs.lead_paragraph: A homicide squad in New York is investigating the death of a pregnant woman found with multiple gunshot wounds inside her car. Her fetus also died.

headline.main: Pregnant NY Woman Shot to Death in Car; Fetus Dies
headline.print_headline: Pregnant NY Woman Shot to Death in Car; Fetus Dies

docs.snippet: A homicide squad in New York is investigating the death of a pregnant woman found with multiple gunshot wounds inside her car. Her fetus also died.

docs.lead_paragraph: Some activists like Rebecca Gomperts are now imagining the unthinkable: a future where most abortions happen at home.

headline.main: The Dawn of the Post-Clinic Abortion

docs.abstract: Doctor and activist Rebecca Gomperts, who started support service Women on Web, has designed program based on idea of providing abortions without direct contact with doctor in countries where abortions are illegal or highly restricted; idea is based on medical abortion, in which pills induce miscarriages in first trimester, and is galvanizing abortion activists even in the United States.
docs.snippet: Some activists like Rebecca Gomperts are now imagining the unthinkable: a future where most abortions happen at home.

docs.lead_paragraph: Ruby Rae Spiegel, still a Yale undergraduate, will see her play “Dry Land,” about a DIY abortion, produced in New York.

headline.seo: Ruby Rae Spiegel’s Play ‘Dry Land’ Confronts Abortion
headline.main: Young, Fearless and Not Into Dragons
headline.print_headline: Young, Fearless and Not Into Dragons

docs.abstract: Yale senior Ruby Rae Spiegel's play Dry Land opens at Here Arts Center; inspiration for play comes from New Republic article about DIY abortions.
docs.snippet: Ruby Rae Spiegel, still a Yale undergraduate, will see her play “Dry Land,” about a DIY abortion, produced in New York.

docs.lead_paragraph: Russia is trying to irritate Finland by its repeated violations of Finnish airspace, Prime Minister Alexander Stubb said on Saturday, while playing down suggestions that the Nordic country was edging closer to NATO.

headline.main: Finnish PM Says Russia Trying to Irritate With Airspace Violation
headline.print_headline: Finnish PM Says Russia Trying to Irritate With Airspace Violation

docs.snippet: Russia is trying to irritate Finland by its repeated violations of Finnish airspace, Prime Minister Alexander Stubb said on Saturday, while playing down suggestions that the Nordic country was edging closer to NATO.

docs.lead_paragraph: A federal judge in Austin, Tex., blocked a stringent new rule on Friday that would have forced more than half of the state’s remaining abortion clinics to close.

headline.main: Judge Rejects Texas Stricture on Abortions
headline.print_headline: Judge Rejects Texas Stricture on Abortions

docs.abstract: Federal Judge Lee Yeakel in Austin, Tex, blocks new rule that would have forced more than half of state's remaining abortion clinics to close; says mandate placed unjustified obstacles on women's access to abortion without providing significant medical benefits; rule required all abortion clinics to meet building, equipment and staffing standards of hospital-style surgery centers.
docs.snippet: A federal judge in Austin, Tex., blocked a stringent new rule on Friday that would have forced more than half of the state’s remaining abortion clinics to close.

byline.original: By ERIK ECKHOLM and MANNY FERNANDEZ

docs.lead_paragraph: Police are seeking further details about photos that appear to show a Utah woman at a nightclub with a beer sometime before her newborn baby was dumped in a trash can.

headline.main: Photos Under Investigation in Abandoned Baby Case
headline.print_headline: Photos Under Investigation in Abandoned Baby Case

docs.snippet: Police are seeking further details about photos that appear to show a Utah woman at a nightclub with a beer sometime before her newborn baby was dumped in a trash can.

headline.main: On Instagram's Hyperlapse, and Fast-Forwarding to the Future

docs.abstract: Instagram’s new tool for capturing time-lapse video could provide a new prism through which people view and present themselves to the world.
